title: Cartridge World Introduces New Technology to Monitor Printers and Boost Business Productivity
text:
Cartridge World Introduces New Technology to Monitor Printers and Boost Business Productivity September 22, 2015 06:03 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
MCHENRY, Ill.--( BUSINESS WIRE )--According to an InfoTrends report, a typical office worker prints about 34 pages a day – that translates to 8,840 pages per year. With ink cartridges providing an average 600 pages per cartridge, that’s almost 15 cartridge changes a month. When it comes to meeting a business’s printing needs, it can be difficult to manage it all. 
In an effort to increase printing efficiency, Cartridge World is offering an exclusive free application, called CW Print Manager™. The app alerts Cartridge World’s business customers when its printer’s ink and/or toner runs low or when the printer needs maintenance. Once alerted, Cartridge World will contact the business regarding its ink and toner needs or maintenance services needed and deliver them straight to the business. By monitoring business’s printer levels and operations, Cartridge World has found a simple way to ensure that your business never runs into a printing crisis. 
“The CW Print Manager software helps business owners keep their offices running smoothly,” said Tom McLaughlin, Cartridge World’s North American Director of Marketing. “Our free app eliminates the worry when it comes to printers breaking down or running out of ink and toner, which will ultimately boost office productivity. With the service alert, Cartridge World will arrive with the needed supplies or services on the same day or next business day. It doesn’t get much simpler than that.” 
In addition to the free application for business owners, Cartridge World has designed its other printing services for business efficiency . Cartridge World also offers a custom online printing supplies portal designed for businesses with for multi-location offices, and companies with different departmental printing needs. See locations for details. Plus, Cartridge World offers: Certified service engineers Special pricing, recycling services and printer programs for business customers Fixed monthly-fee printing services Free next-day delivery of printing supplies 
In 2003, Cartridge World opened its first location in the United States with a line of eco-friendly printer cartridges. Today, the company has more than 1,000 locations in 50 countries, and is delivering 360-degree printing services for businesses – offering printers, cartridges, supplies, delivery, installation, monitoring, maintenance and recycling. With more than 20 years of experience, Cartridge World is among the Top-100 franchises ranked by Entrepreneur Magazine. 
For information about Cartridge World’s eco-friendly products, recycling programs or franchise opportunities, visit a local Cartridge World store or www.CartridgeWorld.com . To learn how much a business can save on office printing costs, visit a local store or Cartridge World’s online savings calculator . For more information about a downloadable brochure with cost savings information, visit http://www.save30percent.com . 
Cartridge World is the leading ink and toner retailer and franchisor in the $80 billion printer cartridge industry. Stores offer customers a tremendous cost-saving alternative to printing, offering a 30-percent discount over full-priced OEM cartridges and a 100-percent satisfaction guarantee. Cartridge World has more than 1,000 franchised retail locations in over 50 countries. For information about Cartridge World products or franchise opportunities visit CartridgeWorld.com .
